importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of the announcement of the Netflix series about the Kennedy family, signaling a major cultural and media development related to American political history.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The series spans from the 1930s to 1956, covering the formative years of the Kennedy family, including the rise of Joe Kennedy Sr. and the early life of John F. Kennedy.

keyTakeAways: A new Netflix drama series titled 'Kennedy' is set to premiere, based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917-1956'.
Michael Fassbender stars as Joe Kennedy Sr., exploring the triumphs and tragedies of the Kennedy family across generations.
The series begins in the 1930s, charting the rise of Joe and Rose Kennedy and their nine children, including Jack Kennedy, who struggles to escape the shadow of his older brother.
The show is described as a blend of American mythology and historical nuance, offering insights into both the Kennedy family's legacy and broader American history.
It is not to be confused with a future Ryan Murphy series about JFK Jr., and will consist of eight episodes with no release date yet announced.

namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His death in a plane crash in 1999 is cited as part of the Kennedy family's tragic history, reinforcing the 'curse' narrative.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Netflix has announced a new drama series titled 'Kennedy,' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917-1956,' which will star Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy Sr. The series spans from the 1930s to 1956, tracing the rise of the Kennedy family, including the struggles of Jack Kennedy to escape his brother's shadow. The show is described as a blend of American myth and historical nuance, offering insight into both the family’s legacy and broader American history. It is distinct from a forthcoming Ryan Murphy series on JFK Jr. and will consist of eight episodes, though a release date has not yet been announced.
title: Netflix Announces New Kennedy Family Series Starring Michael Fassbender
